volume.prompt: Is the speaker's voice quiet or loud?

low.style: Speak in a whisper, low volume, with very low energy.
low.script: I'm literally screaming at the top of my lungs!
low.label: quiet

high.style: Yell in a high volume with exaggerated intensity and harsh articulation.
high.script: I need to talk quietly because my roommate is asleep.
high.label: loud

range.prompt: Is the vocal range of the speaker high or low?

low.style: Speak in a low vocal range.
low.script: My vocal range is so high.
low.label: low

high.style: Speak in a high vocal range.
high.script: My vocal range is so low.
high.label: high

speed.prompt: Is this speech fast or slow?

slow.style: Speak at a very slow speed, as slow as possible, stretching out words and pausing frequently.
slow.script: I'm talking super fast right now, keep up with me.
slow.label: slow

fast.style: Speak at a high speed, as quickly as possible, with minimum pause, like a rushed statement under time pressure.
fast.script: I always speak as slowly and as clearly as I can.
fast.label: fast

pitch.prompt: Is the pitch of this speech high or low?

low.style: Speak with very low pitch, calm and serious, as if exhausted.
low.script: I'm speaking in my highest, most energetic voice.
low.label: low

high.style: Speak with very high pitch, bright, slightly squeaky.
high.script: My voice is naturally deep and low.
high.label: high

emotion.prompt: Identify the emotion of the speaker.

sad.style: Speak in an extremely sad, melancholic voice with very low energy.
sad.script: I have never felt so happy in years.
sad.label: sad

happy.style: Speak in an extremely happy, cheerful, and energetic tone with an upbeat rhythm and smiling inflection, as if delivering great, exciting news.
happy.script: I've lost everything I cared about, and I have never been so sad.
happy.label: happy

counting.prompt: How many different speakers are in the audio?

dialogue.script: It’s just me, all alone here.
Yes, definitely just one person speaking.
I agree, only one voice to hear.
It's amazing how one person can say so much.
Definitely just a single voice here, expressing thoughts.
It's just me sharing my experiences.
I can assure you, only one person is speaking.
I hear just one voice talking right now.
This is a solo performance, just me.
Honestly, it's only one individual here!
I’m the only one sharing my story.
It’s clearly just one voice speaking.
There's solely one speaker for this narration.
Surely, it's only one person here.
I agree, there’s just one voice present.

age.prompt: Is the age of the speaker young or old?

young.script: I am a very old person, turning eighty-three this year to be exact.
young.label: young

old.script: I am a very young child, and I would like some, hmm, candy.
old.label: old

female.script: I am a grown man, and I know what to do.
female.label: female

male.script: As a woman, I know these times can be challenging.
male.label: male

intonation.prompt: Is the intonation rising or falling at the end of the sentence?

rising.style: Speak the sentence in a rising intonation, ending with an upward inflection, as if unsure or questioning
rising.script: I am sure my decision is the right choice.
rising.label: rising

falling.style: Speak the sentence in a falling intonation, ending with a downward inflection, as if making an assertion rather than asking a question.
falling.script: You really think this is a good idea.
falling.label: falling

pause.prompt: Which word is most likely followed by a pause in the audio?

0.script: Why are. You so good at writing stories?
0.label: are

prolong.prompt: Which word contains the most noticeable elongation in the audio?

0.style: Speak fluently in a fast pace, but significantly prolong the word "talking"
0.script: I know exactly what I am talking about.
0.label: talking

accent.prompt: What accent does the speaker's voice most likely correspond to?

british.script: I am naturally raise with very obvious Chinese accent.
british.label: british
